infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: SafeRoute needs your location to show safe routes and enable SOS features.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: SafeRoute needs your location to track your walk and keep you safe.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: SafeRoute needs camera access to attach photos to reports.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: SafeRoute needs photo library access to attach images to reports.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow SafeRoute to use your location to keep you safe during night walks.
